title: The Favorites - NFL Week 10 Best Bets
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Week 10 Best Bets
description:
Week 10 is no time for cowardice, and Chad Millman and pro gambler Simon Hunter of the Action Network once again team up to select their favorite plays on the NFL board. Lots of juicy underdogs have caught they eyes, including a terrific spot for Sean Payton and the Saints. They also hear a round of Sharp Calls and select their survivor pool pick of the week, plus so much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
